findings.title: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)
findings.description: Specific version to ensure that the bytecode does not vary between builds.

findings.title: Potential use of “block.number” as source of randomness (SWC-120)
findings.description: Using block.number as a source of randomness can be insecure.

findings.title: Owner can block user
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to block a user.

findings.title: Owner can set buy/sell fees up to 25%
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to set buy and sell fees up to 25%, which could lead to potential financial losses for users.
